total = [0] * 999
maximum = 0
t = input()
for i in range(0,t):
	n = input()
	ar = raw_input()
	ar = [int(x) for x in ar.split()]
	de = raw_input()
	de = [int(x) for x in de.split()]
	for j in range(0,n):
		for k in range(ar[j],de[j]):
			total[k-1] += 1
	for j in range(0,999):
		if total[j]>maximum:
			maximum = total[j]
		total[j] = 0
	print maximum
	maximum = 0
